#summary UseIt
#labels Phase-Usage
= Usage =

  # Write the latex symbol. e.g.:
{{{
x \in (-\infty, \infty)
}}}
  # Select it and press the shortcut you select in the installation (e.g. ALT+SHIFT+u). The selected text should be converted into: 
{{{
x ∈ (-∞, ∞) 
}}}
  # Could it be easier? Tell us how by cleaving a constructive comment!
